zip.label: Postal Code
zip.description: The contact's zip code. This might be set via import, form, or integration.

state.label: State/Region
state.description: The contact's state of residence. This might be set via import, form, or integration.

degree.label: Degree
degree.description: Contact's degree. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

gender.label: Gender
gender.description: Contact's gender. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

school.label: School
school.description: Contact's school. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

address.label: Street Address
address.description: Contact's street address, including apartment or unit number.

company.label: Company Name
company.description: Name of the contact's company. This can be set independently from the name property on the contact's associated company.

country.label: Country/Region
country.description: The contact's country/region of residence. This might be set via import, form, or integration.

message.label: Message
message.description: A default property to be used for any message or comments a contact may want to leave on a form.

industry.label: Industry
industry.description: The Industry a contact is in

seniority.label: Seniority
seniority.description: Contact's seniority. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

salutation.label: Salutation
salutation.description: The title used to address a contact

start_date.label: Start date
start_date.description: Contact's start date. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

twitterbio.label: Twitter Bio
twitterbio.description: The contact's Twitter bio. This is set by HubSpot using the contact's email address.

work_email.label: Work email
work_email.description: Contact's work email. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

hs_language.label: Preferred language
hs_language.description: Set your contact's preferred language for communications. This property can be changed from an import, form, or integration.

hs_timezone.label: Time Zone
hs_timezone.description: The contact’s time zone. This can be set automatically by HubSpot based on other contact properties. It can also be set manually for each contact.

company_size.label: Company size
company_size.description: Contact's company size. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

job_function.label: Job function
job_function.description: Contact's job function. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

date_of_birth.label: Date of birth
date_of_birth.description: Contact's date of birth. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

field_of_study.label: Field of study
field_of_study.description: Contact's field of study. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

hs_buying_role.label: Buying Role
hs_buying_role.description: Role the contact plays during the sales process. Contacts can have multiple roles, and can share roles with others.

hs_lead_status.label: Lead Status
hs_lead_status.description: The contact's sales, prospecting or outreach status

lifecyclestage.label: Lifecycle Stage
lifecyclestage.description: The qualification of contacts to sales readiness. It can be set through imports, forms, workflows, and manually on a per contact basis.

marital_status.label: Marital Status
marital_status.description: Contact's marital status. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

graduation_date.label: Graduation date
graduation_date.description: Contact's graduation date. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

military_status.label: Military status
military_status.description: Contact's military status. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

kloutscoregeneral.label: Klout Score
kloutscoregeneral.description: A contact's Klout score, a measure of Internet influence

linkedinconnections.label: LinkedIn Connections
linkedinconnections.description: How many LinkedIn connections they have

relationship_status.label: Relationship Status
relationship_status.description: Contact's relationship status. Required for the Facebook Ads Integration. Automatically synced from the Lead Ads tool.

hs_whatsapp_phone_number.label: WhatsApp Phone Number
hs_whatsapp_phone_number.description: The phone number associated with the contact’s WhatsApp account.
